markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs=""
>
[Winter's Embrace](/Feats.aspx?ID=4100) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

Your eyes are accustomed to the harsh glare of the sun on snow and ice. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against effects that inflict the [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) condition. Snow doesn't impair your vision; you ignore [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from snowfall. Your skin becomes cold to the touch, and sometimes frost forms on you. You are protected from [severe cold and heat](/Rules.aspx?ID=642).
name: Winter's Embrace
